item.title: Asset Pricing Project

item.title: Federal Level Pipeline
item.description: Pipeline ![[Excalidraw/Federal Level Pipeline 2023-06-30 12.25.57.excalidraw.light.svg]] Meeting Todo & Answer June 23, 2023 Verify the Fed dataset The dummy for Procurement and Financial Assistance (just saw from a government brochure that this level of stratification is caused by data source difference) Verify the State level data If payment data cover both contract payment and direct payment Action Improve Federal Variable List Add “Award Type” variable to Fed-level data After understanding “types” of data reported in Fed level data, give a definition of amount and how we can use them Give a breakdown (distribution) on amount (contract value) by 9 groups of award data types (to understand the relevancy/representation/importance of each type) [!

item.title: Inspire from HBR Why Entrepreneurs don't need Venture Capital
item.description: Profitability as a measure of cost of capital for different startups spaceship, aircraft, AI, etc. may have lower cost of capital because their profit comes much later meat delivery company like the ones in the podcast have a high cost of capital that prevent them from seeking money from venture capitals and maybe they value advisors and other resources provided by VPs lower?

item.title: USAspending
item.description: Terminology [!faq]- Obligations v.s. Outlays Obligation: When Fed promised to pay Outlay: When Fed’s money is actually paid out Usually it’s more common to measure spending by obligation over outlays.
